name: Outer Atolls
role_in_state: maritime hazard buffer and pilot-outpost chain
culture_adjustments: intense secrecy around local pilot-charts and routes
sea-rituals keyed to reef and tide cycles; stronger animist practice
greater contact with island creole traders; lexical and ritual blending
constraints: ritual reagents costly; augury services limited by imports
no capacity for heavy industrial shipyards
notes: serves as first warning chain for storms and enemy approach
high apprenticeship rates in piloting and augury guilds
distinct local pilot-chart variants prized by mainland captains
